subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Luciano Emilio and Chris Pontius scored 36 seconds apart in the closing minute, giving D.C. United a stunning 3-2 win over the Red Bulls at Giants Stadium.
snippet: Luciano Emilio and Chris Pontius scored 36 seconds apart in the closing minute, giving D.C. United a stunning 3-2 win over the Red Bulls at Giants Stadium.
